original: diṣṭyā āvayoḥ gataṃ gataprāyaṃ jīvataśca udancati utpadyate |
analyzed: diṣṭyā āvayoḥ gatam gata prāyam jīvataḥ ca udancati utpadyate

original: uktamarthamarthāntareṇa samarthayate anukūla: vidhiḥ deva jagataḥ śreyaḥ maṅgalaṃ karoti hi |
analyzed: uktam artham artha antareṇa samarthayate anukūla vidhiḥ deva jagataḥ śreyaḥ maṅgalam karoti hi

original: kausalyāsutasya rāmasya bāhudaṇḍābhyāṃ calitayā vidha tathā jyāvalyā mauvalatayā cakrīkṛtaṃ maṇḍalīkṛtaṃ sphūrjat śabdāyamānaṃ kārmukaṃ dhanu tena koṇe : kṣitaiḥ bāṇai: dalitā chinnā prāṃvā kaṇṭhaḥ yasya tathoktaḥ |
analyzed: kausalyā sutasya rāmasya bāhu daṇḍābhyām calitayā tathā jyāvalyā mauvala tayā cakrīkṛtam maṇḍalīkṛtam sphūrjat śabdāyamānam kārmukam dhanu tena koṇe kṣitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ dalitā chinnā kaṇṭhaḥ yasya tathā uktaḥ

original: karāla130 jānakīpariṇaye muktanyaśarīramāratayā mūrtyā svayaṃ tatkṣaṇaṃ rākṣasyā davadagdhatālanimayā dugdhe mudaṃ dyosadām ||
analyzed: jānakī pariṇaye mukta nya śarīra māra tayā mūrtyā svayam tad kṣaṇam rākṣasyā dava dagdha tāla nimayā dugdhe mudam
gārīcaḥ māyayā cakṣuḥ mārgam atyakramīt iti
tatas praviśati cāpa avaropita śaraḥ rāmaḥ
rāmaḥ amba diṣṭayā vayam anugṛhītāḥ tatrabhavatyā
tvad pāda paṅkana parāga avadhūta pāpmā bhartāram ārta jana bāndhatra rāmacandra

original: śuśrūpituṃ punarapi prayatā pareva vāñchāmi gautamamṛṣiṃ vitarāmyanujñām ||
analyzed: śuśrūpitum punar api prayatā parā iva vāñchāmi gautamam ṛṣim vitarāmi anujñām

original: tatkṣaṇaṃ tasminnetra kṣaṇe muktanyaṃkuśarīraṃ tyaktamṛgadehaṃ yathā tathā saṅkuritayā prādurmūhayā davadagdhatālanibhā vanāgnidagdhatālavṛkṣasadṛśyā ( atropamā ) rākṣasyā mūrtyā rākṣasaśarīre saha svayaṃ patan san yavi ākāśe svarge vā sīdantīti dyo. sadaḥ devāsteṣāṃ mudaṃ santoṣaṃ dugdhe janavatītyarthaḥ |
analyzed: tad kṣaṇam tasmin etra kṣaṇe mukta nyaṃku śarīram tyakta mṛga deham yathā tathā saṅkuritayā prādurmūhayā dava dagdha tāla nibhā vana agni dagdha tālavṛkṣa sadṛśyā atra upamā rākṣasyā mūrtyā rākṣasa śarīre saha svayam patan san yavi ākāśe svarge vā sīdanti iti sadaḥ devāḥ teṣām mudam santoṣam dugdhe janavati iti arthaḥ

original: mārīca: māyayā cakṣuṣoḥ dṛśo: mārge saraṇi gocaratāṃ atyakramīta atikrāntaḥ iti matvā cāpāt dhanuṣaḥ avaropitaḥ avatāritaḥ śaraḥ yena saḥ bālaḥ rāmaḥ prāṃtanivartate ||
analyzed: mārīca māyayā cakṣuṣoḥ dṛśaḥ mārge saraṇi gocara tām atyakramīta atikrāntaḥ iti matvā cāpāt dhanuṣaḥ avaropitaḥ avatāritaḥ śaraḥ yena saḥ bālaḥ rāmaḥ

original: ārtajanabāndhava vipannajanabandho rāmabhadra tatra pādapaṅkajasya parāgeṇa pāṃsunā vidhūtapāpmā nirastapāpā ataeva prayatā śuddhā ahaṃ pureba pūrvavana punarapi bhatīraṃ gautamaṃ ṛṣi śuśrūṣituṃ vāñchāmi abhyanujñāṃ anumatiṃ vitara dehi |
analyzed: ārta jana bāndhava vipanna jana bandho rāmabhadra tatra pāda paṅkajasya parāgeṇa pāṃsunā vidhūta pāpmā nirasta pāpā ataeva prayatā śuddhā aham purā iba pūrva vana punar api gautamam ṛṣi śuśrūṣitum vāñchāmi abhyanujñām anumatim vitara dehi
ahalyā padma ba dhukula uttaṃsa pariṇepyāma jānakīm
pikala kāśyapau atra aparādhyati mārīca māyā

original: āviṣkṛtā mama puro janakātmajeti māyaiva tena jananīvadhakopitena |
analyzed: āviṣkṛtā mama puras janakātmajā iti māyā eva tena jananī vadha kopitena

original: tattanmayānucaritaṃ paramārthabuddhyā nānyatra kiṃ tu bhavatoḥ suhṛdoḥ samīpe ||
analyzed: tat tat mayā anucaritam parama artha buddhyā na anyatra kim tu bhavatoḥ suhṛdoḥ samīpe
na khalu punar bhagavataḥ tāta kauśi kasya
yaḥ punar evam māyā prayoge pratividhānam upadekṣyati

original: padmapandhukulottaṃsa ravikulacūḍāmaṇe rāma jānakī pariṇedhyāsa ukṣyāṃsa sarvān niśicarān jitvā trijagat pālayiṣyasi rakṣiṣyasi ||
analyzed: padma pandhu kula uttaṃsa ravi kula cūḍāmaṇe rāma jānakī sarvān niśicarān jitvā trijagat pālayiṣyasi rakṣiṣyasi

original: jananyāḥ mātṛstāṭakāyāḥ vadhena kopitena tena mārīcena mama puraḥ janakātmajati māyaiva āviṣkṛtā prakaṭīkṛtā |
analyzed: jananyāḥ mātṛstāṭakāyāḥ vadhena kopitena tena mārīcena mama puras janakātmajati māyā eva āviṣkṛtā prakaṭīkṛtā
mayā parama artha buddhayā yathārtham idam sarvam iti matyā

original: kintu suhṛdoḥ sakhyo: bhavatossamīpe tattat anucārataṃ anuṣṭitam |
analyzed: kintu suhṛdoḥ sakhyaḥ bhavatoḥ samīpe tat tat

original: ) bho jānīta kumārayātapadavīmetāṃ hataśvāpadāṃ kuntaiḥ kṛntata rundhate vanapathaṃ kaṇṭhīravā bhairavāḥ |
analyzed: bho jānīta kumāra yāta padavīm etām hata śvāpadām kuntaiḥ kṛntata rundhate vana patham kaṇṭhīravāḥ bhairavāḥ

original: agre yāntamanuprayānti kariṇaṃ bhītaṃ kariṣyo bhiyā tūṣṇīṃ paśyata kheladeṇamithunaṃ caṇḍāṭṭahāsairalam ||
analyzed: agre yāntam anuprayānti kariṇam bhītam kariṣyaḥ bhiyā tūṣṇīm paśyata khela deṇa mithunam caṇḍa aṭṭahāsaiḥ alam
rāmaḥ mā āmantriṣyataḥ mad upajīvi janasya ayam uta ūṣaḥ

kunta kṣuṇṇa tara kṣu vakta galita kṣoṇī niviṣṭa arbhaka ghrāṇa vyāpata rohita āhita bahūkāram vana abhyantaram

original: kauśikaṃ vihāya anyasya manuṣyasāmānyasya purataḥ na prakāśanīya ma ||
analyzed: kauśikam vihāya anyasya manuṣya sāmānyasya puratas na

original: bho janāḥ hatāḥ śvāpadāḥ duṣṭamṛgāḥ yasyāntām |
kumāreṇa rāmeṇa yātāṃ gatāṃ padavīṃ mārga jānīta budhyadhvam |
analyzed: kumāreṇa rāmeṇa yātām gatām padavīm mārga jānīta budhyadhvam

original: bhairavāḥ bhayaṅkarāḥ kaṇṭhīravāḥ siṃhāḥ vanapathaṃ vanamārga rundhate uparundhanti tataḥ tān kuntaiḥ prāsaiḥ kṛntata chinta |
analyzed: bhairavāḥ bhayaṅkarāḥ kaṇṭhīravāḥ siṃhāḥ vana patham vana mārga rundhate uparundhanti tatas tān kuntaiḥ prāsaiḥ kṛntata chinta

original: kariṇyaḥ vaśāḥ bhiyā bhayena agre yāntaṃ gacchantaṃ kariṇaṃ gajaṃ anuprayānti anudhāvanti |
analyzed: kariṇyaḥ vaśāḥ bhiyā bhayena agre yāntam gacchantam kariṇam gajam anuprayānti anudhāvanti

original: khelat krāṃḍat eṇī ca eṇaśca eṇau kuraṅgau tayormithunaṃ dvandva tūṣṇīṃ niśceṣṭaṃ yathā tathā paśyata caṇḍāgṛhāsaiḥ bhayaṅkararaudrahāsaiḥ alaṃ paryāptam |
analyzed: khelat krāṃḍat eṇī ca eṇaḥ ca eṇau kuraṅgau tayoḥ mithunam tūṣṇīm niśceṣṭam yathā tathā paśyata caṇḍā gṛhāsaiḥ bhayaṅkara raudra hāsaiḥ alam paryāptam

original: kṣvelāgarjitameva vīrāṇāṃ siṃhanāda eva siṃhagarjitaṃ yadvā velāgarjitena jātaṃ siṃhagarjitaṃ athavā velā garjitañca siṃhagarjitañca tataḥ bhayena bhrāmyantaḥ tataito dhāvantaḥ gajaprāmaṇyaḥ gajaśreṣṭhāḥ teṣāṃ phīṭkāreṇa dravatāṃ dhāvatāṃ ṛkṣāṇāṃ bhallūkānāṃ darśanena kṛtaḥ bhrūbhaṅgaḥ bhṛkuṭi: yaistathokkāiśākhāmṛgā vānarā yasmiṃstat |
analyzed: kṣvelā garjitam eva vīrāṇām siṃha nādaḥ eva siṃha garjitam yat vā velā garjitena jātam siṃha garjitam athavā velā garjitam ca siṃha garjitam ca tatas bhayena bhrāmyantaḥ dhāvantaḥ gaja prāmaṇyaḥ gaja śreṣṭhāḥ teṣām phīṭkāreṇa dravatām dhāvatām ṛkṣāṇām bhallūkānām darśanena kṛtaḥ bhrū bhaṅgaḥ bhṛkuṭi yaiḥ tathā ukkā iśākhāmṛgāḥ vānarāḥ yasmin tat

original: kuntaiḥ prāsaiḥ kṣuṇṇānāṃ cūrṇitānāṃ tarakṣūṇāṃ mṛgādanāṃnāṃ vaktrebhyaḥ mukhebhyaḥ galitāḥ srastāḥ ataeva kṣoṇyāṃ bhūmau niṣaṇṇāḥ śayitāḥtṛtīyo'ṅkaḥ |

original: pānthānāṃ śaraṇārthinīva caraṇaṃ chāyā taroḥ sevate bhānurdigvalayaṃ vilokitumiva vyomāgramārohati |
analyzed: pānthānām śaraṇa arthinī iva caraṇam chāyā taroḥ sevate bhānuḥ diś valayam vilokitum iva vyoma agram ārohati

original: tṛpyantī dayitārpitaṃ kisalayaṃ nālokate kokilā klāntāṃ vījayati priyāṃ madhukaraḥ pakṣānilenādhunā ||93||

original: 12 arthakāḥ nijāṃśaśavaḥ teṣāṃ ghrāṇe āprāṇa vyāvṛtaiḥ pravṛttaḥ rohitaiḥ eṇamaṃdai: āhitaḥ kṛtaḥ bahūkāra: bhuvassammārjanaṃ yasmistathābhūta cāsti |
analyzed: arthakāḥ nija aṃśa śavaḥ teṣām ghrāṇe āprāṇa vyāvṛtaiḥ pravṛttaḥ rohitaiḥ āhitaḥ kṛtaḥ bahūkāra bhuvaḥ sammārjanam yasmin tathābhūta ca asti
arbhaka āghrāṇa tatpara rohita śvāsa anilena pāṃmūnām apagama ahakāraḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: dinasya ahaḥ yauvanārambhaḥ tāruṇyoekramaḥ maddhyāhakāla ityarthaḥ |
analyzed: dinasya ahar yauvana ārambhaḥ maddhyāha kālaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: adhunā aya tage: vṛkṣasya chāyā śaraṇārthinīca tāpabhayāt tācchīlyena rakṣakamatheyamānevāsatī panthāna niyaṅgacchantīti pānthāḥ adhvagāḥ teṣāṃ caraṇa pādaṃ sevate bhajate |
analyzed: adhunā vṛkṣasya chāyā śaraṇa arthinī ca tāpa bhayāt tācchīlyena panthāna panthāna sevate bhajate

original: bhānusūryaḥ digyalaya digmaṇḍalaṃ vilokituṃ draṣṭumiṣa vyomnaḥ ākāśasya anaṃ śikhara ārohati |
analyzed: bhānu sūryaḥ diś yalaya diś maṇḍalam vilokitum vyomnaḥ ākāśasya anam śikhare ārohati

original: tṛpyantī pisāvatī kokilasya strī kokilā dayitana kokilana arpita datta kisalayaṃ paśrva nālokate na paśyati |
analyzed: tṛpyantī pisāvatī kokilasya strī kokilā arpita datta kisalayam na ālokate na paśyati

original: madhukaraḥ bhṛṅgaḥ klāntāṃ ātapapīḍitāṃ priyaḥ hī pakṣānilena garudvātena vījayati vījanopacāravatī karoti |
analyzed: madhukaraḥ bhṛṅgaḥ klāntām ātapa pīḍitām priyaḥ hī pakṣa anilena garut vātena vījayati vījana upacāravatī karoti

original: iti śrī śvetāraṇyanārāyaṇa śarmaṇaḥ kṛtiṣu jānakīpariṇayavyākhyāyāṃ bālarajanyākhyāyāṃ tṛtīyāṅkavyākhyā pūrṇā ||caturtho'ṅkaḥ |
analyzed: iti śrī śvetāraṇyanārāyaṇa śarmaṇaḥ kṛtiṣu jānakīpariṇayavyākhyāyām bālarajanī ākhyāyām tṛtīya aṅka vyākhyā pūrṇā caturtha ūṅkaḥ

original: nihatya yuvi tāṭakāṃ saha balai: subāhuṃ tathā karālamapi rāghavo mama purīmanaiṣīditi |
analyzed: nihatya yuvi tāṭakām saha subāhum tathā karālam api rāghavaḥ mama purīm anaiṣīt iti
yama prahita vācikam niśamayan vṛṣā manyate niśāṭa badha nāṭaka prathama bhūmikā upakramam

original: ataḥ khalvanena parituṣṭena samādiṣṭo'smi nikhilamuracaṛcūḍāmaṇi kiraṇapuñjakiñjalkitacaraṇāravindena mahārājamahendreṇa |
analyzed: atas khalu anena parituṣṭena samādiṣṭaḥ asmi nikhila mura caṛ cūḍāmaṇi kiraṇa puñja kiñjalkita caraṇa aravindena mahā rāja mahā indreṇa

original: " ayi citrāṅgada, saṃprati kiṃ pratipadyate svajanavinipātama vakarṇa yan kumbhakarṇāgraja iti laṅkāṃ praviśya vicāraya" iti |
analyzed: ayi citrāṅgada saṃprati kim pratipadyate sva jana vinipātam vakarṇa yan kumbhakarṇa agrajaḥ iti laṅkām praviśya vicāraya iti
sa vitarkam prādurbhavati devasya pakṣapātaḥ raghūdvahe
yāvān abhyadhikam tasmāt rāvaṇe droha cintanam

original: rāghavaḥ rāmaḥ yudhi yuddhe tāṭakāṃ balaissainyaissaha subāhu tathā karālamapi nihatya saṃhala mama yamasya mama purī anaipati prāpayaditi evarūpa yamena prahitaṃ preritaṃ vācika sandeśavāce niśamayan śṛṇvan vṛṣā indraḥ niśāyāmaṭantīti niśāṭāḥ rākṣasāsteṣāṃ vadhaeva nāṭakaṃ tatra prathamabhūmikopakrama prathamapraveśyaveṣārambhaṃ manyate |
analyzed: rāghavaḥ rāmaḥ yudhi yuddhe tāṭakām balaiḥ sainyaiḥ saha subāhu tathā karālam api nihatya saṃhala mama yamasya mama purī prāpayat iti evarūpa yamena prahitam preritam vācika sandeśa vāce niśamayan śṛṇvan vṛṣā indraḥ niśāyām aṭanti iti niśāṭāḥ rākṣasāḥ teṣām vadhaḥ eva nāṭakam tatra prathama bhūmikā upakrama prathama praveśya veṣa ārambham manyate
rākṣasa vadha rūpa nāṭake tāṭakā ādi vadham prathama bhūmikām manyate iti bhāvaḥ

original: samādiṣṭaḥ ājñāpitaḥ nikhilasurāṇāṃ cakrasya samūhasya nūḍāmaṇikiraṇayujena śiroratnamayūkhasamūhena kiñjalki te sañjātakialke caraṇāravindesya tena |
analyzed: samādiṣṭaḥ ājñāpitaḥ nikhila surāṇām cakrasya samūhasya nūḍāmaṇi kiraṇa yujena śiraḥ ratna mayūkha samūhena kiñjalki te sañjāta kialke caraṇa aravinde tena

original: devasya indrasya .raghuvahe rāme yāvān pakṣapātaḥ snehaḥ prādurbhavati udbhavati devasya rātraṇe tasmāttāvatorāyavasnehāt abhyadhikaṃ drohasya cintanaṃ prādurbhavati ||
analyzed: devasya indrasya raghu vahe rāme yāvān pakṣapātaḥ snehaḥ prādurbhavati udbhavati devasya rātraṇe tasmāt tāvatoḥ āyava snehāt abhyadhikam drohasya cintanam prādurbhavati

original: mayā tu māyāgṛhītarākṣasavaṣeṇa rākṣasarājadhānīyaṃ sarvataḥ parirakṣitāpi supraveśā saṃvṛttā |
analyzed: mayā tu māyā gṛhīta rākṣasa vaṣeṇa rākṣasa rājadhānīyam sarvatas parirakṣitā api su praveśā saṃvṛttā
kā punar iyam rākṣasī mām etra abhivartate

original: asyāḥ khalu uṣṭasyeva mukhaṃ kaḍārakuṭilāḥ prādeśamātrāḥ kacāḥ kucirdundubhireva ko'pi kutrayoḥ sthūlaḥ ṛśīyān paraḥ |
analyzed: asyāḥ khalu uṣṭasya iva mukham kaḍāra kuṭilāḥ prādeśa mātrāḥ kacāḥ kuciḥ dundubhiḥ eva kopi sthūlaḥ ṛśīyān paraḥ

original: bāhū vāhasadarbhagau gajapaterī yathāḍī tathā tenāsyāṃ maṇibhūvaṇāni dadhate duḥsthānaśocyāṃ daśām ||1||
analyzed: bāhū vāhasa darbha gau gaja paterī yathā āḍī tathā tena asyām dadhate duḥsthāna śocyām daśām

original: ( tataḥ praviśati rākṣasī) rākṣasī – ( citrāṅgadaṃ prati |
analyzed: tatas praviśati rākṣasī rākṣasī citrāṅgadam prati

original: ) bhaicha, ko tumaṃ kiṃ karālo ahavā aṇṇo |
analyzed: bhaicha kaḥ tumam kim karālaḥ ahavā aṇṇaḥ

original: gandharvaḥ – (ātmagatam |) anayā saṃbhāvagasya svayameva mārgo darśitaḥ |
analyzed: gandharvaḥ ātma gatam anayā saṃbhāvagasya svayam eva mārgaḥ darśitaḥ

original: tuha ghariṇī giddhamuhī uṇa rudaṃtīṇaṃ rakkhasīṇaṃ mamāṇāṇāho rāmasaraṇihado tti ura tāḍaaṃdī ajja vi roaṇaṃ ṇa muṃcedi |
analyzed: tuha ghariṇī giddha muhī uṇa rudaṃtīṇam rakkhasīṇam rāma saraṇi hadaḥ tti ajja vi roaṇam na muṃcedi

original: 1. bhadra, kastvaṃ kiṃ karālaḥ, athavā anyaḥ |
analyzed: bhadra kaḥ tvam kim karālaḥ athavā anyaḥ

original: tava gṛhiṇī gṛdhramukhī punaḥ rudatīnāṃ rākṣasīnāṃ madhyavartamānā nātho rāmaśara nihata ityurastāḍayantyadyāpi rodanaṃ na muñcati |

original: udvāhakṛte vivāhakaraṇāya ābhyāṃ rāmalakṣmaṇābhyāṃ saha drutaṃ śīghraṃ svasthānaṃ āgatommi|

original: tathā tena prakāreṇa tanvaṅgayā: kṛśāṅkayā: sītāyāḥ hutavadde amo patanaṃ māyā mārīcamāyota niścinvataḥ (ahalyāvacanāt ) nirṇaya topi me adyāpi ātaṅkena bhayena ganyunā duḥkhena ca nonmuktaṃ na vyakta hṛdayaṃ mithyābhūtamapi asatyajātamapi videhādhipa janake imaṃ paulastyasya rāvaṇasya vyatikrama śiraścaṃdanarūpāpacāraṃ smṛtvā saṃyati yuddhe tasya daśaśirāṃsyapi ucchettuṃ utkaṇṭhate abhivāñchati |
analyzed: tathā tena prakāreṇa tanu aṅgayā kṛśa aṅkayā sītāyāḥ patanam māyā mārīca māyā uta niścinvataḥ ahalyā vacanāt me adya api ātaṅkena bhayena duḥkhena ca na unmuktam na vyakta hṛdayam mithyā bhūtam api asatya jātam api videha adhipa janake imam paulastyasya rāvaṇasya vyatikrama śiraḥ caṃdana rūpa apacāram smṛtvā saṃyati yuddhe tasya daśa śirāṃsi api ucchettum utkaṇṭhate abhivāñchati

original: ayaṃ ārya: pūjya: kuśikātmajaḥ vitānasya yajñasya idaṃ vaitānaṃ karma vyapadiśya vyājīkṛtya vasudhākanyāyāḥ sītāyāḥ vivāhotsavaṃ nirvodu niṣpādayituṃ sahasā śīghraṃ sarveḥ bandhubhissamaṃ māṃ samānayanīti haṃtoḥ |
analyzed: ayam ārya pūjya kuśika ātmajaḥ vitānasya yajñasya idam vaitānam karma vyapadiśya vyājīkṛtya vasudhā kanyāyāḥ sītāyāḥ vivāha utsavam niṣpādayitum sahasā śīghram sarveḥ bandhubhiḥ samam mām samānayani iti haṃtoḥ

original: kauśikaḥ yajño me bhaviteti kosalapatiṃ dāraiḥ sutaiśvānayan ruddhastāṭaka yāsmi vartmani rajovṛṣṭiṃ sṛjantyā bhṛśam |

original: kauśikaḥ vale strīti parāṅmukhe'pyudapatadvāṇaḥ svayaṃ kārmukāt daśānanaḥ – kiyānasya munipāśasya kṣatriyavaṭāvapyasminmāhātmya māropayituṃ yatnaḥ |

original: prāyeṇa bahuśa: niruddhantaṃ mārge nirodhaṃ kurvantaṃ asmāka parijanaṃ mārīcādika ativandhāya vañcayitvā |

original: śatrughna: - parṇādini, tatra gatayo raghukulīnayo rājaputrayoḥ kīdṛśī pravṛttiḥ |

original: śatrughna:- (sabāṣpam |) kathaṃ māyā prayuktā tayorapi dāruṇaṃ kartuṃ vyavasyatā rākṣasarājena |288 jānakīpariṇaye śūrpaṇakhā tarhi śrayatām |

original: sāketādbharatena bhūmipatinā sainyā vayaṃ preṣitāḥ sāhāyyāya tavāvakarṇitavatā laṅkāpure saṅgaram |

original: ityāgatya salakṣmaṇe raghusute naktaṃ prasupte tathā 'paulastyasya bhaṭaiḥ kṛtaṃ nṛtanubhiḥ bharataśatrughnau—(sodvegam |) kathaṃ kṛtaṃ kathaṃ kṛtam |

original: ( prakāśam |) bharataḥ — hā ārya rāma, hā vatsa lakṣmaṇa, (iti mohamupagataḥ |) śatrughnaḥ – hā kathamāryāvevaṃgatau |

analyzed: anantaram ca svapantaḥ eva sugrīva ādayaḥ mad suhṛdaḥ rākṣasaiḥ śastra pāṇibhiḥ nanu bhaṇāmi kau yuvām iti

original: he rāma tava laṅkāpure saṅgaraṃ yuddhaṃ avakarṇitavatā śrutavatāṃ bhūmipatinā bharatena tava sāhāyyāya sahāyatvāya sāketāt ayodhyāpurāt vayaṃ preṣitāḥ ityuktvā āgatya nṛtanubhiḥ naraśarīradharaiḥ paulastyasya rāvaṇasya bhaṭaiḥ naktaṃ rātrau malakṣmaṇe raghusute rāme prasupte sati tathā kṛtam ||

original: ārye jānaki yaḥ pravāsadivase śvaśrūjanastvāṃ vadhūṃ paśyanvalkalamārgadarśita kaṭībandhakramaṃ gṛhṇatīm |

original: niśācareṇa rāvaṇena apahṛtā niruddhā aśokavane uparuddhā kelisakhī krīḍāsahacarī bhava iti kadarśitā kutsitaprārthanāviṣayīkṛtā tayoḥ rāmalakṣmaṇayoḥ avasthāmapi bodhitā ca sītā udvandhanāt rajvādinā kaṇṭhabandhanāt asūn prāṇān śuca du khaśca muktavatī |
analyzed: niśācareṇa rāvaṇena apahṛtā niruddhā aśoka vane uparuddhā keli sakhī krīḍā sahacarī bhava iti kadarśi tā kutsita prārthanā viṣayīkṛtā tayoḥ rāma lakṣmaṇayoḥ avasthām api bodhitā ca sītā udvandhanāt rajvādinā kaṇṭha bandhanāt asūn prāṇān śuca muktavatī

original: ārme jānaki prayāsa divase banaprayāṇadine yastava śvaśrūjanaḥ āryeṇa rāmeṇa darśitaḥ kavyāṃ kaṭideśe bandhakramaḥ bandhamarītiryasya tat valkalaṃ 25190 jānakīpariṇaye śokānmohamupāgataḥ sa kimidaṃ śṛṇvanvisoḍhuṃ kṣamastyaktī yatkila khinnayā tanurabhūdudvandhanena tvayā ||

aham tu na jāne kim idānīm ācaritavyam iti

original: ) idānīṃ naiṣa panthā vāṃ sahāyā na hi santi yat ||

original: nītā eva caturdaśāpi śarado yāsāṃ dineṣu kṣaṇo'pyekaḥ kalpavadāsta me dinabhidaṃ tvāryāgamasyāvadhiḥ |

original: prāyeṇādya samāgatasya vipinādāryasya pādāmbujaṃ drakṣyāmīti samutsukasya nanu me chinno'bhilāṣadrumaḥ ||22||
analyzed: prāyeṇa adya samāgatasya vipināt āryasya pāda ambujam drakṣyāmi iti samutsukasya nanu me chinna ubhilāṣa drumaḥ

original: (iti mūrcchati :) gṛhṇatīṃ ādadānāṃ vadhūṃ snuṣāṃ tvāṃ paśyan san śokāt mohaṃ mūrcchāmupāgataḥ |
analyzed: iti mūrcchati gṛhṇatīm ādadānām vadhūm snuṣām tvām paśyan san śokāt moham mūrcchām upāgataḥ

original: saḥ khinnayā duḥkhitayā tvayā udvandhanena tanuḥ tyaktā abhūnkileti yat idaṃ śṛṇvan san visoḍhuṃ kṣamaḥ kim |
analyzed: saḥ khinnayā duḥkhitayā tvayā udvandhanena tanuḥ tyaktā abhūt kila iti yat idam śṛṇvan san visoḍhum kṣamaḥ kim

original: niryātayiṣyāmaḥ vigamayiṣyāmaḥ 'niryātanaṃ vairaśuddhau dāne nyāsārpaṇepi ca' ityamaraḥ vāṃ yuvayoḥ ||
analyzed: niryātayiṣyāmaḥ vigamayiṣyāmaḥ niryātanam vaira śuddhau dāne nyāsa arpaṇe api ca iti amaraḥ vām yuvayoḥ

original: caturdaśa śaradaḥ saṃvatsarā api nītā eva yāsāṃ śaradāṃ dineṣu ekaḥ kṣaṇopi kalpa. vat pralayakālavat me āsta asti sma |
analyzed: caturdaśa śaradaḥ saṃvatsarāḥ api nītāḥ eva yāsām śaradām dineṣu ekaḥ kṣaṇaḥ api kalpa vat pralaya kāla vat me āsta asti sma

original: idaṃ dinantu āryāgamasya rāmāgamanasya avadhi: avasānadinam |
analyzed: idam ārya āgamasya rāma āgamanasya avadhi avasāna dinam

original: prāyeṇa bahuśaḥ adya asmindine vipināt vanāt samā. gatasya āryastha pādāmbujaṃ drakṣyāmīti samutsukasya mabhyagutkaṇṭhāvataḥ me mama abhi lāṣa eva drumaḥ chinnaḥ nanu chintra eva |
analyzed: prāyeṇa bahuśas adya asmin dine vipināt vanāt samā gatasya āryastha pāda ambujam drakṣyāmi iti samutsukasya me mama abhi lāṣaḥ eva drumaḥ chinnaḥ nanu chintraḥ eva

original: śūrpaṇakhā – (svagatam) bharata, na kevalaṃ bhavataḥ, mamāpi rūpavanta mimamabhilaṣantyāśchinna evārtham |
analyzed: śūrpaṇakhā svagatam bharata na kevalam bhavataḥ mama api rūpavantam imam abhilaṣantyāḥ chinnaḥ eva artham
param tu nāsikayām sārdham iti avagantavyam

original: śatrughnaḥ – (sotkaṇṭhaṃ saśokaṃ ca |) tadvakraṃ śaradindubimbamadhuraṃ te padmapatrāyate netre tau ramaṇīyagāruḍamaṇistambhopamānau bhujau |
analyzed: śatrughnaḥ sa utkaṇṭham sa śokam ca tat vakram śarad indu bimba madhuram te padmapatrāyate netre tau ramaṇīya gāruḍa maṇi stambha upamānau bhujau

original: tau lakṣmīkara padmakelikamalacchāyau ca pādau tathābhāvādāryaraghūdvahasya na punardraṣṭuṃ mayā śakyate ||
analyzed: tau lakṣmī kara padma keli kamala chāyau ca pādau tathābhāvāt ārya raghūdvahasya na punar draṣṭum mayā śakyate

original: (iti mūrcchati |) śūrpaṇakhā – (svagatam |) mayā punastadakhilaṃ dṛṣṭvāpi na pūrito manorathaḥ (prakāśam |) vatsa śatrughna, samāśvasihi samāśvasihi |
analyzed: iti mūrcchati śūrpaṇakhā svagatam mayā punar tat akhilam dṛṣṭvā api na pūritaḥ manorathaḥ prakāśam vatsa śatrughna samāśvasihi samāśvasihi
param tu asya śokasya pratīkāraḥ cintyatām

original: bharataḥ – (samāśvasya |) trātavyā maṇipāduke mama puraskṛtya tvayā medinī vastavyaṃ ca vane caturdaśa mayā varṣāṇi tātājñayā |
analyzed: bharataḥ samāśvasya trātavyāḥ maṇi pāduke mama puraskṛtya tvayā medinī vastavyam ca vane caturdaśa mayā varṣāṇi tāta ājñayā
āryasya raghu drahasya rāmasya tathā bhāvāt tādṛśa sthiteḥ

original: śaradindubimbavat madhuraṃ ruciraṃ ( atra uttaratracopamā ) tat (āryastha) va padmapatre iva āyate dīrghe te netre |
analyzed: śarad indu bimbavat madhuram ruciram atra tat āryastha padma patre iva āyate dīrghe te netre
ramaṇīya gāruḍa maṇi stambha umānau ramyam gārutmat rana stambha tulyau tau bhujau

original: lakṣmyāḥ karapadmayoḥ padmasadṛśahastayoḥ sthite ye keli. kamale krīḍāpadme tayoḥ chādeva chāyā kāntiryayostathābhūtau tau pādau ca |
analyzed: lakṣmyāḥ kara padmayoḥ padma sadṛśa hastayoḥ sthite ye keli kamale krīḍā padme tayoḥ chādā iva chāyā kāntiḥ yayoḥ tathābhūtau tau pādau ca

original: ( he bharata ) mama maṇipāduke ratnapādukādvayaṃ puraskṛtya tvayā medinī bhūḥ trātavyā rakṣyā |
analyzed: he bharata mama maṇi pāduke ratna pādukā dvayam puraskṛtya tvayā medinī bhūḥ trātavyā rakṣyā

original: mayā ca tātājñayā caturdaśavarṣāṇi vane vastavyam |292 jānakīpariṇaye kāmaṃ pūrayituṃ tatastava bhuvaṃ śāsmīti māṃ lālayan yāto'yaṃ na nivartate yadi punaḥ śokaṃ sahipye katham ||

original: bharataḥ - hā vatsa lakṣmaṇa, yenāryasya tadānurudhya hṛdayaṃ kṣāntaṃ pituśceṣṭitaṃ mātā me na niyantritā valadatā notsāritā mantharā |

original: āryeṇānugataḥ purādi vane nāke samīkāṅkaṇātsa tvaṃ darśitabhaktirāryaviṣaye dhanyo'si nāhaṃ tathā ||

original: 27 tataḥ tadanu tava kāmaṃ abhilāṣaṃ pūrayituṃ bhu śālmi iti māṃ lālayan vinoda yan yātaḥ vanaṃ gataḥ ayaṃ ārya: na nivartate yadi punaḥ śokaṃ kathaṃ sahiṣye |

original: analaṃ pravakṣyantau agnipraveśa kariṣyantau yuvāṃ anuyāsyāmi anugamiṣyāmi ||

original: rāmādyeṣu gateṣu ca triṣu tato'patyeṣu gatyā vidhe sturyastvaṃ naya jīvitaḥ pitṛjanaṃ tṛpti nivāpāmbubhiḥ ||28 śūrpaṇakhā – (svagatam |) kathaṃ śatrughno jīviṣyati, hanta kimardhameva phalipyati me manorathaḥ (prakāśam |) vatsa bharata, tavetra śatrughnasyāpi śokabhāra: |
analyzed: rāma ādyeṣu gateṣu ca triṣu tata upatyeṣu gatyā vidhe sturyaḥ tvam naya jīvitaḥ pitṛ janam nivāpa ambuṣu śūrpaṇakhā svagatam katham śatrughnaḥ jīviṣyati hanta kim ardham eva phalipyati me manorathaḥ prakāśam vatsa bharata tava itra śatrughnasya api śoka bhāra

original: śatrunna:- (sāsram |) 193 priyāpatyeṣu yuṣmāsu gateṣu rudataḥ pitṝn |

original: śūrpaṇagvā-vatsa śatrughna, tena hi tvaryatā, mendhanānalayorāharaṇāya ca |

original: adhibhadravedi paṭṭābhiṣekamaṅgalavedikāyāṃ rucirāḥ ramyā: śrīgandhāḥ candanādigandhadravyāṇi puṣpāṇi akṣatā: akhaṇḍitakuṅkumāktataṇḍulāśca sajjantāṃ sajjā bhavantu |
analyzed: adhibhadravedi paṭṭābhiṣekamaṅgalavedikāyām rucirāḥ ramyā śrī gandhāḥ candana ādi gandha dravyāṇi puṣpāṇi akṣatāḥ akhaṇḍita kuṅkuma akta taṇḍulāḥ ca sajjantām sajjāḥ bhavantu

original: śubhārthī: vāripūrṇa: kalaśāḥ kumbhāḥ chatraṃ ātapatraṃ tathā cāmare ca sthāpyantām |
analyzed: śubha arthī kalaśāḥ kumbhāḥ chatram ātapatram tathā cāmare ca sthāpyantām

original: upānte samīpe vājiṃdā aśvena saha gajaḥ vasatu |
analyzed: upānte samīpe vājiṃdā aśvena saha gajaḥ vasatu

original: yataḥ adhunā idānīṃ raghupateḥ paṭṭābhiṣekaḥ tatassajjantāmiti pūrveṇa yojyam |
analyzed: yatas adhunā idānīm raghu pateḥ paṭṭābhiṣekaḥ tatas sajjantām iti pūrveṇa yojyam

original: 60 #108 jānakīpariṇaye kanyāḥ kāścana tatra santu vasatūpānte gajo vājinā tānta pahā yato raghupateḥ paṭṭābhiṣeko'numā ||
analyzed: jānakī pariṇaye kanyāḥ kāścana tatra santu vasatu upānte gajaḥ vājinā yatas raghu pateḥ

original: ) • vasiṣṭhaḥ – sakhe kauśika, sītārāmāvasmin siṃhāsane niveśya, maharṣibhiranyaiśca sahābhiṣiñcāvaḥ |
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ sakhe kauśika sītā rāmau asmin siṃhāsane niveśya mahā ṛṣibhiḥ anyaiḥ ca saha abhiṣiñcāvaḥ

original: janaka – abhirikta eva rāmabhadraḥ kṣaumābharaṇādibhiḥ prītidānaiḥ sambhāvayati paurajānapadān |
analyzed: janaka abhiriktaḥ eva rāmabhadraḥ kṣauma ābharaṇa ādibhiḥ prīti dānaiḥ sambhāvayati paura jānapadān

original: kathaṃ divi devadundubhidhvaniḥ, puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ, apsarasāṃ naṭanārbhaṭī ca |
analyzed: katham divi deva dundubhi dhvaniḥ puṣpa vṛṣṭiḥ apsarasām naṭana arbhaṭī ca

original: kauśikaḥ — vatsa, kiṃ te bhūyaḥ priyamupaharāmi |
analyzed: kauśikaḥ vatsa kim te bhūyas priyam upaharāmi

original: 'rāmaḥnirvighnaṃ mama jānakīpariṇayo jātaḥ prasādena te paulastyaṃ sagaṇaṃ vijitya samare pratyāhṛteyaṃ priyā |
analyzed: rāmaḥ nirvighnam mama jānakī pariṇayaḥ jātaḥ prasādena te paulastyam sa gaṇam vijitya samare pratyāhṛtā iyam priyā

original: dṛṣṭo'yaṃ bharataścirāmilapito rājyābhiṣeko'pi me labdhaḥ kiṃ priyaptanyadasti bhuvane yatsādhanīyaṃ tvayā ||61 maitrāvaruṇaye vasiṣṭhāya |
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ ayam bharataḥ cira amilapitaḥ rājya abhiṣekaḥ api me labdhaḥ kim priya ptanyat asti bhuvane yat sādhanīyam tvayā maitrāvaruṇaye vasiṣṭhāya

original: cirāt abhilaṣitaḥ ayaṃ bharataḥ dṛṣṭaḥ cirāt ( sarvaiḥ) abhilaṣitaḥ me rājyābhiṣekopi labdhaḥ |
analyzed: cirāt abhilaṣitaḥ ayam bharataḥ dṛṣṭaḥ cirāt sarvaiḥ abhilaṣitaḥ me rājya abhiṣekaḥ api labdhaḥ

original: bhuvane jagati tvayā sādhanīyam tat ( uttebhya: ) anyat kiṃ priyamasti |
analyzed: bhuvane jagati tvayā sādhanīyam tat anyat kim priyam asti

original: ) * mārga darśitamāśrayantu manujjā manvādibhiḥ śreyase rājāno'pyagṛhītapaiśunagiro rakṣantu dhanyā mahīm |
analyzed: mārga darśitam āśrayantu manuj jāḥ manu ādibhiḥ śreyase rājānaḥ api agṛhīta paiśuna giraḥ rakṣantu dhanyāḥ mahīm

original: lālyantāṃ sarasoktayaśca kavayaḥ śaśvadrasajñairjanaiḥ syādetasya kaveśca bhaktiracalā deve raghūṇāṃ prabho ||
analyzed: lālyantām sarasa uktayaḥ ca kavayaḥ śaśvat rasa jñaiḥ janaiḥ syāt etasya kaveḥ ca bhaktiḥ acalā deve raghūṇām prabho
iti śrī rāmabhadradīkṣita kṛte jānakīpariṇayanāṭake saptamaḥ oṅkaḥ

original: manujā: manuṣyāḥ śreyase aihikāmuṣmikasukhāya manvādibhiḥ darśitaṃ mārga āśrayantu |
analyzed: manujāḥ manuṣyāḥ śreyase aihika āmuṣmika sukhāya manu ādibhiḥ darśitam mārge āśrayantu

original: rājānopi agṛhītāḥ ( piśunānāṃ sūcakānāṃ imā:) paiśunyaḥ giraḥ vāyaḥ gaistathoktāḥ ataeva dhanyāḥ sukṛtinaśca santaḥ mahīṃ rakṣantu |
analyzed: rājānaḥ api agṛhītāḥ piśunānām sūcakānām imāḥ paiśunyaḥ giraḥ ataeva dhanyāḥ sukṛtinaḥ ca santaḥ mahīm rakṣantu

original: sarasoktayaḥ rasavadracanāḥ kavayaśca śaśvatsadā rasajñaiḥ rasavidbhiḥ janaiḥ lālyantāṃ vinodyantām |
analyzed: sa rasa uktayaḥ rasavat racanāḥ kavayaḥ ca śaśvat sadā rasa jñaiḥ rasa vidbhiḥ janaiḥ lālyantām vinodyantām

original: kiñca etasya kaveḥ rāmabhadradīkṣitākhyakaveḥ deve raghuṇāṃ prabhau śrīrāme acalā sthirā bhaktismyāt |
analyzed: kiñca etasya kaveḥ rāmabhadradīkṣita ākhya kaveḥ deve raghuṇām prabhau śrī rāme acalā sthirā
ānandita mucukundam vṛndāraka vṛnda vandyam a dvandvam
sundara pada aravindam mukunda mā ānanda kandam abhivande

original: 309 iti śrīśvetāraṇyanārāyaṇa śarmaṇaḥ kṛtipu jānakīpariṇayavyākhyāyāṃ bālarañjanyākhyāyāṃ saptamākavyākhyā samāptimagat ||
analyzed: iti śrī śveta araṇyanārāyaṇa śarmaṇaḥ jānakīpariṇayavyākhyāyām bālarañjanī ākhyāyām saptamāka vyākhyā samāptimagat

original: * ācandrārkamidaṃ bhavedavirala gobrāhmaṇebhya: śubha bhūyāccāgamavṛvasevibhiriyaṃ rājanvatī rājābhiḥ |
analyzed: ācandrārkam idam śubha bhūyāt ca āgama vṛva sevibhiḥ iyam rājanvatī

original: lālyantāṃ sarasā vayaṃ ca kavayaśśaśvadra sajñaimsa ma syādetasya kaveśca bhaktiracalā deve raghūrṇā prabhau ||
analyzed: lālyantām sarasā vayam ca kavayaḥ śaśvat ra sa jñaim sa mā syāt etasya kaveḥ ca bhaktiḥ acalā deve raghūrṇā prabhau
